layout.singingstanza: B- I- B- L- E, B- I- [skip1] B- L- E, B- I- B- L- E, the B- I- [skip1] B- L- E, Je -- sus said, It's writ -- ten that a man shall live by the Word pro -- ceed -- ing [skip1] from the mouth of God.

lyrics.stanza: B-I-B-L-E, B-I-B-L-E, B-I-B-L-E, the B-I-B-L-E, Jesus said, It's written That a man shall live By the Word proceeding From the mouth of God.
Not by bread alone, But by the Word of God, Not by bread alone But by the Word of God! NO! man cannot live by Earthly bread alone; YES! we need the words of the B-I-B-L-E!
